entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. A few flurries or periods of drizzle beginning this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
